full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,SKABS DANG PO'I DOGS DPYOD BLO GSAL RIGS SMRA'I RGYAN CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @137B CES SKABS DANG PO'I DOGS DPYOD BLO GSAL RIGS SMRA'I RGYAN CES BYA BA 'DI YANG BLO DMAN BDAG 'DRAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BRIS PA NI DGAG BYA CHE LA DGOS PA CHUNG MDO, GROGS PA BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO 'GA' ZHIG GIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG 'BRI DGOS ZHES AU TSUGS NAN TAN BGYIS PA'I THOG TING KYIS KYANG SKYE BA KUN TU LAM BZANG 'DI DANG MI 'BRAL BA'I BAGS CHAGS TZA MA DU, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA DKA' BCU CHOS RJE'I MING SKAM 'DZIN PA, ^BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG DON GRUB RIN CHEN CES BYA BA ZHIG GIS BRIS PA'I YI GE'I 'DU BYED PO NI CHOS LA DAD @138A 'DUN CHE BA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSE RING DANG DAD LDAN DGE TSUL LANG SGROL DKAR GNYIS KYIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I RIG LUGS DRI MA MED PA PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , LEGS BSHAD RIN CHEN DOGS GCOD 'DI'I SPAR, ,BLO GSAL RNAMS KYI 'CHAD NYAN 'PHEL PHYIR DU, ,DAR PA PAndI TA YI SKYE MING PAS, ,BKRA SHIS DAR RGYAS GLING GI CHOS GRVAR BSGRUB, ,'DIS MTSON RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I PHUNG PO 'DI, ,'JAM MGON BLA MA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE, ,PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS KUN TU DAR RGYAS ZHING, ,BSTAN 'DZIN RNAMS KYI ZHABS PAD BRTAN PA DANG, ,RGYAL KHAMS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR YUL PHYOGS 'DIR, ,DGE BA BCU YIS LUGS SROL 'PHEL PA DANG, ,MA NOR LAM BZANG STON PA'I BSHES GNYEN GYIS, ,DGYES BZHIN RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN DU SHOG , ,,
author_simple: BLO BZANG DON GRUB RIN CHEN,
